name: Grimland
description:
"Grimland" is a classic 2D side-scrolling platform slasher.

The kingdom was attacked by monsters, the Evil necromancer imprisoned the queen in a dungeon. The queen has a light magical power that can put an end to the horror that is happening, but she is very weak and locked by magical shackles. You have to free the queen and return peace and security to the lands of Grimland.

You will visit 3 different locations with many different types of enemies. The game contains puzzle elements - you need to find path solutions to continue your mission.

Game Features:
  • Beautiful pixel graphics
  • Steam Achievements support
  • Different types of enemies to beat
  • Secret quest items and puzzles
